headline: As Trial Nears, G.O.P. Senator Dodges His Base to Stay Afloat
abstract: As the Senate impeachment trial of President Trump nears, the Republican senator from Colorado has gone to ground as he tries to keep moderates and independents in his corner while facing a tough re-election race.
lead_paragraph: DENVER — They keep expecting to see Senator Cory Gardner everywhere — on the local Fox affiliates in Colorado, on Facebook, on literature crammed inside their mailboxes. They are voters who wear tasteful crepe blouses and carry structured Kate Spade totes, who like how their 401(k)’s are performing but say they could do without President Trump’s “temperament.”
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
